title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Interprofessional Flipped Learning for Public Health Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic public health concepts and understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze community public health issues and set priorities through collaboration with diverse professional groups.
Learners can design public health interventions based on scientific evidence and present them effectively.
Learners acquire communication skills to explain complex public health issues to the general public through media interview simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
